data.eml:eml: Taxonomy of the freshwater crabs of Costa Rica, with a revision of the genus Ptychophallus Smalley, 1964 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Pseudothelphusidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Magalhães, Célio, Wehrtmann, Ingo S., Lara, Luis Rólier, Mantelatto, Fernando L. (2015): Taxonomy of the freshwater crabs of Costa Rica, with a revision of the genus Ptychophallus Smalley, 1964 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Pseudothelphusidae). Zootaxa 3905 (3): 301-344, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.235127
